page.title: 15Ombersley Endowed First Sch.
page.content: Our school is over 100 years old. It has a stone underneath the school bell where the date{1876}is engraved. There are{two classes}at the moment. Mrs Clark teaches the 4-6 year olds and Mr Finn teaches the 7-9 year olds.In September 1985 there will be{49 {children,}which means we will have another teacher, Mrs Nixon, who will work in the mornings. Mrs Scott is our secretary and ancillary helper. She works four mornings and on Mondays takes a group for cookery. Mrs Phillips has three jobs.She is lunchtime supervisor,ancillary in the afternoon and cleaner with Mrs Haug after school.Mrs Price and Mrs Trow are the crossing patrol ladies on the busy roads through the village.We have a{Friends Association}which this year raised money to buy a word processor and printer for our computer.
